4302650.name: In The Liminality Demo
4302650.description:
Experience Connection with a short demo of In The Liminality, a cosmic/psychological story-based horror adventure game for players age 18 and older. Enter esoteric Doors and Connect with strange, surreal friends inside...

Demo Includes:

- An abridged "intro" section
- 3 fully-realized levels to explore, handpicked from the full game's 24 "Doors"
- 2 Hours of unique and surreal original soundtrack
- Unique artstyle blending everything from photographic imagery, to surreal sketches, to hand-drawn pixel-art all-in-one
- Surreal creatures and friends designed by a variety of talented artists

Along with a dedicated ending segment, and potential other goodies...



This demo contains roughly 1.5 - to - 3 Hours of Content to explore and enjoy, introducing characters and plotlines that will develop across the full game...
4302650.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
